| A anti-matter vortex:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not have a solid form](/wiki/Unsolid "Unsolid").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                                       |

The **anti-matter vortex** is a new monster in [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass") and older versions of [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack").

## NetHack brass/UnNetNack

The anti-matter vortex is a very dangerous monster to encounter if one lacks [disintegration resistance](/wiki/Disintegration_resistance "Disintegration resistance"). Any weapon that hits it will be disintegrated, as well as the armor, and eventually the body of anyone who is engulfed by it.

## Strategy

If the player does not have disintegration resistance, use [Elbereth](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth") and teleport away, or use attack spells. Anything you hit it with will be disintegrated, so don't use ranged weapons unless you don't mind them being destroyed.

## Encyclopedia Entry

Swirling clouds of pure elemental energies, the vortices are thought to be related to the larger elementals. Though the vortices do no damage when touched, they are noted for being able to envelop unwary travellers. The hapless fool thus swallowed by a vortex will soon perish from exposure to the element the vortex is composed of.
html:
Anti-matter vortex

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
v Anti-matter vortex
Difficulty 17
Attacks Engulfing 1d10 disintegration
v Anti-matter vortex
Difficulty 17
Attacks

Engulfing 1d10 disintegration

Base level 15
Base experience 394
Speed 18
Base AC 0
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 0
Nutritional value 0
Size Huge
Resistances electricity, fire, cold, sleep, disintegration, poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed None

A anti-matter vortex:

  • can fly.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.

The anti-matter vortex is a new monster in NetHack brass and older versions of UnNetHack.

NetHack brass/UnNetNack

The anti-matter vortex is a very dangerous monster to encounter if one lacks disintegration resistance. Any weapon that hits it will be disintegrated, as well as the armor, and eventually the body of anyone who is engulfed by it.

Strategy

If the player does not have disintegration resistance, use Elbereth and teleport away, or use attack spells. Anything you hit it with will be disintegrated, so don't use ranged weapons unless you don't mind them being destroyed.

Encyclopedia Entry

Swirling clouds of pure elemental energies, the vortices are thought to be related to the larger elementals. Though the vortices do no damage when touched, they are noted for being able to envelop unwary travellers. The hapless fool thus swallowed by a vortex will soon perish from exposure to the element the vortex is composed of.
